title: I have spent over 800 in skins and other RP related items, and am unable to do anything anymore.
body: ive spent a lot of money on this game, and i enjoyed it, i played the game a lot, and i would appreciate a helping hand from Riot, the client opens, i am not even able to queue up, i get a lot of "group not found" stuff when i try to make champion choices, i get lots of "disconnected from riot servers" i am at the point where i want to give up on Riot, as someone who has played since the start of this game, and i dont want it to come to an end, but i cant get anything done, i cant even get in matches anymore, and if i do i disconnect and lose LP, before anyone asks its not a Firewall problem. i want to know how to fix these problems, and if i cant get a response, i will just call it quits. and walk away from riot games.

replies.body: Horse are you a member of the Support team, Dev team or in any way an employee of Riot?

No. I've just been on the support boards since it opened, and actually read the EULA.

But thank you.

PS: Use the reply button so that I get notification of your reply in the future. ;)

Spending money on this game is optional. If you're going to leave because of it being faulty, then you'll know how to treat future "free-to-play" games with monetisation features in them.

Firstly, what OS are you on, and which ISP are you with? Could you provide the basic specs of your computer? Have you opened up a support ticket, and if so, what did they have to say? Are any of these errors you mention repeatable under certain conditions, or are they always random?
